remarks: The projective map of a meet.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Jan-2012.)
statement:
pmapmeet.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pmapmeet.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
pmapmeet.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
pmapmeet.p $e |- P = ( pmap ` K ) $.
pmapmeet $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( P ` ( X ./\ Y ) ) = ( ( P ` X ) i^i ( P ` Y ) ) ) $.
